visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a 3D cylindrical column chart. The chart should visualize confirmed COVID-19 cases for women in Norway, segmented by age groups. The chart should have a title, styled axes and labels, and a specific color scheme. Additional configurations should include 3D settings, tooltip formatting, and series data.

title.text: Number of confirmed COVID-19 cases for women in Norway

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a 3D cylindrical column chart. The chart type is set to 'cylinder', and 3D options are enabled with specific angles and depth settings. The title of the chart is 'Number of confirmed COVID-19 cases for women in Norway', and the subtitle includes a link to the source data. The x-axis represents age groups, and the y-axis represents the number of reported cases. Both axes have styled titles and labels with defined colors and font sizes. The tooltip displays the age group when hovering over a column. The plot options include a depth setting for the series and a specific color scheme for each column. The series data represents the confirmed COVID-19 cases for women in Norway, segmented by age groups.
